titleStmt.title: By the generall assemblie of the Confederate Catholiques of Ireland this assembly taking seriously into consideration that Owen Mac Arte O Neill, late generall of Ulster, & Emer Lord Bishop of Clogher, being traiterously disaffected ...
titleStmt.author: Confederate Catholics.

notesStmt.note: Other title information from first lines of text.
Imperfect: cropped and tightly bound with loss of text."
"Given at Kilkenny, the thirtieth day of September Anno Domini, 1648."
